A technique that infuses [[chakra]] into ink to form clones of the user. If struck, the ink clones revert back to plain ink. 

== Forms ==
* Sai's clones have demonstrated the ability to communicate mentally with him.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 476, pages 8-9</ref>
* Killer B's clones, available through the [[Eight-Tails]]' ability to [[Ink Creation|produce ink]], can use partial transformations of the Eight-Tails.<ref>''Naruto'' chapter 566, page 9</ref>
